segments.text: May I help you with something ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to return some books .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: These books were due two weeks ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I totally forgot they were due .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You will need to pay late fees on these books .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much are the late fees ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The fee is 25 cents every day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to pay 25 cents a day ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And that ’ s for each book that is late .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That shouldn ’ t be a problem .
segments.speaker: S2
